content: निपुण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Clever, sharp, shrewd, skilful; वयस्य निसर्गनिपुणाः स्त्रियः <ls>M. 3.</ls> {@--2@} Proficient or skilled in, conversant or familiar with (with <ab>loc.</ab> or <ab>instr.</ab>); वाचि निपुणः; वाचा निपुणः. {@--3@} Experienced. {@--4@} Kindly or friendly towards. {@--5@} Acute, fine, delicate, minute, sharp. {@--6@} Complete, perfect, accurate. --णं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} or निपुणेन {@--1@} Skilfully, cleverly. {@--2@} Perfectly, completely, totally. {@--3@} Exactly, carefully, accurately, minutely; निपुणमन्विष्यन्नुपलब्धवान् <ls>Dk. 59.</ls> {@--4@} In a delicate manner.
